Furthermore, and as a direct consequence of North/South inequalities, participants stressed the risk of increasing social inequalities:
These new technologies would create even more power asymmetries. (RC – Group III)
Let us suppose one of geoengineering projects goes wrong . . . Who is better equipped to protect himself/herself from this? It is not those who are more affected by it . . . Undoubtedly, those who would pay the prize are those who have no capacity to do so and are already in a very vulnerable position. (SD – Group I)
